user_query: My friends and I are planning a movie night and we need some recommendations. Can you search for videos related to 'romantic comedy' on Vimeo? Also, fetch the related people in the 'romance' category to get insights from experts. Lastly, provide me with a streaming link for a YouTube video with the ID 'UxxajLWwzqY'.

TaskList.description: Search for videos related to 'romantic comedy' on Vimeo.
Fetch related people in the 'romance' category for expert insights.
Provide a streaming link for the YouTube video with the ID 'UxxajLWwzqY'.
